thread.title: Michael Jackson’s daughter Paris is ‘getting close’ to Lydia Bright’s ex Tom Kilbey
thread.title_full: Michael Jackson’s daughter Paris is ‘getting close’ to Lydia Bright’s ex Tom Kilbey

author: spacker
title: Michael Jackson’s daughter Paris is ‘getting close’ to Lydia Bright’s ex Tom Kilbey
text:
Comments MICHAEL Jackson’s daughter Paris is getting close to former Towie star Tom Kilbey. 
The pair’s unlikely relationship was sparked in the US where the ex-reality star, who used to date show veteran Lydia Bright, is currently working on a budding career in fashion. Michael Jackson’s daughter Paris is getting close to former Towie star Tom Kilbey 
The pair were recently spotted in LA, days after Paris split from her long-term boyfriend Michael Snoddy. 
The reaction to their sighting has caused shockwaves through the cast back in the UK who can’t believe the Essex hunk has managed to bag such a famous pal. Related Links STRIKING THE RIGHT NOTE Adele, Paris Jackson and Carrie Underwood lead the way on the red carpet at the Grammy Awards BLANKET COVERAGE Blanket Jackson makes rare outing in LA weeks after sister Paris claimed their father was murdered PRINCESS OF ROCK The life of Lisa Marie Presley, Elvis's daughter and ex-wife of Michael Jackson, revealed TOEWIE GATE Towie star Megan McKenna posts a video of her feet AGAIN in a fresh bid to prove that she doesn't have six toes Bags of appeal Gemma Collins goes on a designer spree 'up West' after showing off her dramatic weight loss THE SILVER LINING As James 'Arg' Argent reveals he won't be returning to Towie we take a look at his achievements to date... 
A source said: “The Towie cast can’t believe it. 
“Tom has been trying to make a name for himself in the States and has managed to become involved in set made up of aspiring young fashion hopefuls. 
“They have been getting close and both share the same drive for their careers but it’s believed the relationship is not romantic.” 
Tom, whose sister Cara was also a former Towie castmember, appeared in the ITVBe reality series in 2012.
